awd_titl_txt: Gas Dynamic Involving Negative and Mixed Nonlinearity
awd_abstract_narration: This theoretical/numerical modeling effort is aimed at                          exploring the behavior of retrograde fluids, and those                          exhibiting negative non-linearities, in various steady flow                     configurations which occur either in laboratory experiments                     designed to define fluid characteristics, or power plant                        cycles designed to take advantage of these properties.                                                                                                          The results of the modelling will be useful both in design of                                                                                                   experiments to provide more definitive data on the behavior of                                                                                                  these unusual fluids, as well as engineering possibilities to                                                                                                   design Rankine cycle power systems with significantly lower                     losses from shock and condensation effects.
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems

inst.inst_name: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

pgm_ref.pgm_ref_txt: REU SUPP-Res Exp for Ugrd Supp
